UNCOMMON_SEASON_FORMAT: Anomaly detected: The season '{season}' uses an uncommon format pattern compared to other season values.
UNUSUAL_SEASON: Anomaly detected: The season '{season}' appears in only {frequency} out of {total_seasons} records, which is unusually rare.
TEMPORAL_ANOMALY: Anomaly detected: The season '{season}' references year {year}, which is outside the typical range of {typical_range}.
INCONSISTENT_SEASON_PATTERN: Anomaly detected: The season name in '{season}' is inconsistent with common season names like {common_season_names}.
